forum.name: Implications of Using Problems of the Month
forum.intro:
While we discussed this briefly in Session 4.1, let’s think some more about how you might use a Problem of the Month with adult learners.

What would be the benefits and challenges of doing a Problem of the Month in your classroom? Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to share your thoughts in the discussion forum below.

Be sure to read others’ postings and respond to at least one other participant. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.) Consider using the following sentence frames in your responses:

  • I can relate to . . . because . . .
  • I wonder if you thought about . . .

(Additional Problems of the Month can be found at Inside Mathematics. Note that a Problem of the Month is designed to be revisited over the course of a month, and an instructor may use multiple Problems of the Month in a given course.)
